about_the_game:
THE NEW VAMPIRE FANTASY ACTION RPG.
The Vampires of The West Coast have conspired against Ashzel. They've taken his Power Dagger in an attempt to Sabotage his personal power. He must face the Vampires in Combat. A Fire has risen in Ashzel, to Rise, Gain, Reclaim and Master his power. Rise, Gain, and Master your power as Ashzel.
• A World Full of Excitement and Eeriness
A world where action, mystery and sophistication are seamlessly connected. A variety of locations with beautiful three-dimensional designs. As you explore, the joy of discovering unknown and overwhelming threats that await you, lead to a high sense of accomplishment.
• Embody Ashzel the Vampire
Develop your play style, such as harnessing power, outmaneuvering the traitors, use combat skills to become a vampire warrior, increase financial wealth by collecting gold, nourish yourself with bottles of blood, and avoid deadly liquid traps.
• An Epic Elegant Drama
detailed_description:
THE NEW VAMPIRE FANTASY ACTION RPG.
The Vampires of The West Coast have conspired against Ashzel. They've taken his Power Dagger in an attempt to Sabotage his personal power. He must face the Vampires in Combat. A Fire has risen in Ashzel, to Rise, Gain, Reclaim and Master his power. Rise, Gain, and Master your power as Ashzel.
• A World Full of Excitement and Eeriness
A world where action, mystery and sophistication are seamlessly connected. A variety of locations with beautiful three-dimensional designs. As you explore, the joy of discovering unknown and overwhelming threats that await you, lead to a high sense of accomplishment.
• Embody Ashzel the Vampire
Develop your play style, such as harnessing power, outmaneuvering the traitors, use combat skills to become a vampire warrior, increase financial wealth by collecting gold, nourish yourself with bottles of blood, and avoid deadly liquid traps.
• An Epic Elegant Drama
name: Ashzel & The Power Dagger

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Windows
  • Memory: 226 GB RAM
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Windows
  • Memory: 226 MB RAM

short_description: Ashzel & The Power Dagger, is a Vampire Fantasy action-adventure RPG. Set in the Eerie, mysterious, dark, and sophisticated West Coast - a place where the Vampires of the West Coast are drawn into wonder, awe, and elegant drama.
